name: GLEX
description: The biggest problem facing cryptocurrencies today is that they lack technical knowledge for everyone to use. To compensate for this, we will to lower the entry barrier of cryptocurrency through a more intuitive method and simplified process for all GLEX users. Through GLEX Masternode PROJECT, PINE PLATFORM has developed a Masternode platform and aims to expand through continuous innovation to provide various functions. It will also minimize the risk of individual participants, provide periodic masternode rewards, and provide the market with credibility, access, and less volatility.
